definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be smooth, slippery (NH adj. [[חָלָק]] smooth, empty, Ar. xalaqa make smooth, lie, forge, fabricate)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[ח]] Ho 10:2; 3 mpl. [[חָֽלְקוּ]] Ps 55:22; —smooth, slippery, only fig.: Ho 10:2 of heart of faithless Isr. (so Ew Ke Wü Now RVm), We false; >Vrss (not LXX) Hi St who rd. [[חֻלַּק]], divided is their heart; LXX e)me/risan; of words, smooth Ps 55:22 i.e. deceptive (‖[[רַכּוּ דְבָרָיו]] [[מִשֶּׁמֶן]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֶחֱלִיק]] Ps 36:3, [[הֶחֱלִיקָה]] Pr 2:16, Pr 7:5; Impf. [[יַחֲלִיקוּן]] Ps 5:10; Pt. [[מַחֲלִיק]] Pr 28:23 + 2 t.; make smooth:
lit. of idol-maker Is 41:7 c. acc. instr. [[פַּטִּישׁ]] hammer.
fig. the tongue, i.e. flatter with it Ps 5:10, Pr 28:23, words Pr 2:16, Pr 7:5 [[אֲמָרֶיהָ הֶחֱלִיקָה]]; abs. deal smoothly, sq. [[אֶל־]] Ps 36:3, [[עַל]] Pr 29:5.
